methods.applyUpdate:
Apply this update to this SelectAndViewAnalyzer.

:param upstream: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.Listener.Update) - the upstream update
:param toClear: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.utils.RowSet) - rows that used to exist and no longer exist
:param helper: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.select.analyzers.SelectAndViewAnalyzer.UpdateHelper) - convenience class that memoizes reusable calculations for this update

text: A layer that maintains the redirection rowSet for future SelectColumnLayers.
